ID: C1DE054_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-13 23:30
Subject: Major Incident Resolved: VPN Connectivity Issue in D3 
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the VPN connectivity issue impacting remote access to the D3 network has now been successfully resolved.

Users should now be able to connect to the VPN without any issues.
Incident Start Time: 13 June 2025, 11:00 AM GST
Resolution Time: 13 June 2025, 11:300 PM GST

Our Tech teams have implemented the necessary fix and will continue to monitor the network to ensure stability.

Thank you for your patience and cooperation during this period. 

If you continue to face any issues, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
